about_the_game:
STORY

It's a tranquil day in downtown suburbia, where Dynamite Joe enjoys the peace and quiet of this idyllic neighborhood. Birds chirp, kids play, and life seems normal. But, as fate would have it, an extraordinary and unexpected event unfolds that shatters the serenity of this peaceful town—a fish invasion!

Imagine the shock on everyone's faces when they witness their fellow residents being mind-controlled by none other than common seafood! The once-peaceful streets are now filled with exclamations like "Oh my cod" and "What the fishy f**k!" as townspeople grapple with this bizarre and fishy crisis.

In the midst of this piscine pandemonium, you step into the shoes of Dynamite Joe, ready to take on the responsibility of saving the residents from this unusual and potentially catastrophic fate. Armed with an impressive arsenal of fun guns, cool grenades, and an unwavering determination that knows no bounds, you embark on a thrilling first-person action adventure.

Your mission? To restore not only peace to the world but also tranquility to suburban America. The stakes couldn't be higher as you square off against a horde of mind-controlled fishy foes. Can you stand up to the challenge, thwart the fishy takeover, and ensure the town can sleep easy once more? Or will you find yourself becoming fish bait in this high-stakes battle against the most unexpected of adversaries?

GAMEPLAY

Dynamite Joe vs. The Deep Sea Invasion is a thrilling throwback to the 80s, placing you in the shoes of a young teen armed with a brand new first-person shooter. In this game, you'll not only battle enemies but also dive into an engaging narrative. What's more, the 80s setting adds a nostalgic touch to the experience. As you enjoy the game, you'll also be intrigued by the eerie happenings in the 'real' world around you, making for an unforgettable game-within-a-game journey.

content_descriptors.notes: Stylized blood, language depictions of suicide, and references to cannibalism

name: Dynamite Joe VS The Deep Sea Invasion
